mapper.insert: insert into reply(no, userid, nickname, coment) values(${no}, #{userid}, #{nickname}, #{coment})
mapper.select: select replyno, no, nickname, coment, date_format(createdate, "%m/%d %H:%i")createdate from reply where no=${param1} order by replyno desc
mapper.update: update reply set coment=#{coment} where replyno=${replyno} and nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.delete: delete from reply where replyno=#{param1} and nickname=#{param2}
